response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This offer takes into account its worth to you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further terms. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
